title: Bellator Europe 5/Bellator 230 weigh-in results: Ex-185 champ Rafael Carvalho on mark for move to 205
text:
The weigh-ins are in the books for Saturday’s Bellator Europe 5 event in Italy, and all the fighters on the dual cards hit their marks.

In the Bellator 230 main event, former middleweight champion Rafael Carvalho (16-3 MMA, 7-2 BMMA) moves up to light heavyweight to take on Vadim Nemkov (10-2 MMA, 3-0 BMMA). Carvalho was 205 pounds on the nose. Nemkov came in at 205.6.

And in the Bellator Europe 5 headliner, Melvin Manhoef (31-14-1 MMA, 3-3 BMMA) takes on Yannick Bahati (9-4 MMA, 0-1 BMMA) at light heavyweight. Manhoef came in at 205.2; Bahati was 205.6.

Bellator Europe 5 and Bellator 230 take place Saturday at Allianz Cloud in Milan, Italy. The Bellator Europe 5 card streams on the Bellator app and MMA Junkie. The Bellator 230 main card airs on Paramount and streams on DAZN via tape delay.

The full Bellator Milan weigh-in results included:

BELLATOR 230 (Paramount, DAZN, 9 p.m. ET, via tape delay)

Rafael Carvalho (205) vs. Vadim Nemkov (205.6)

Hesdy Gerges (229.4) vs. Dragos Zubco (229.6)

Domingos Barros (264.8) vs. Kirill Sidelnikov (263.4)

Andrea Fusi (169.2) vs. Walter Pugliesi (170.4)

Daniel Cassell (154.6) vs. Nicolo Solli (155.4)

BELLATOR EUROPE 5 (Bellator app, 5 p.m. ET)
description: Check out the official results from the Bellator Milan fighter weigh-ins.
